description: Deletes a user level permission for a Slack channel configuration.

parameters.name: ChatConfigurationArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the SlackChannelConfiguration associated with the user identity to delete.

parameters.name: SlackTeamId
parameters.description: The ID of the Slack workspace authorized with AWS Chatbot.

parameters.name: SlackUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user in Slack.
